name: Synth Et Sis
description:
2D platformer exploration game. Every encounter helps Synth become more complete.

Credits

Design and art: chatnone 

Music: listentocooper

Development: GeekZebra

Story

Discovery of  queerness  and the quest to live fully and wholeheartedly. A constant process of exploring and growing.

Controls

  • A: left
  • D: right
  • (When unlocked) W or Space: jump
